Text.Page:
The Celestial Arena Guide, {@linkcreature:183#7001#Gaderong}, has been asking about you. He has an idea about pitting proven champions against each other in the area.

If you're interested, seek him out in Highwatch.

......

Oh! Yes, you're on my list! Welcome!

I'm trying to generate interest in my new arena, and having someone like you compete will certainly draw a crowd! Interested?"I'm up for the challenge."
